explains: n. 热线；热线电话，咨询电话

sentences.en: The company also has a Web page for small businesses and a hotline.
sentences.cn: 公司还有针对小企业的网页和一条服务热线。

sentences.en: They have discussed setting up a military hotline between Hanoi and Bangkok.
sentences.cn: 他们已讨论在河内和曼谷之间建立一条军事热线。

sentences.en: The hotline has received more than 1,800 phone calls.
sentences.cn: 该热线已接到1800多个电话。
